title: Why the last 5 years before retirement can make or break your future, and what to do now
description: The five years before retirement are critical for Americans. Nearly half worry their savings won’t last. Boosting contributions, cutting expenses, or adding side income can make a huge difference. Shifting to lower-risk investments and adding inflation-protec…
content: The five years before retirement are the most critical for Americans. This period can make or break your golden years. Nearly half of Americans approach retirement unsure if their savings will last. … [+8430 chars]
